alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 3:02PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Idaho County through 245 PM PDT... At 201 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 44 miles northeast of McCall, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dixie, Red River Hot Spring, Warren, Orogrande, Elk City, and Mackay Bar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM PDT for central Idaho.
